Reviews.Title: BLACKBERRY- OEM FOR CHEAT STORE
Reviews.Author: drjaba
Reviews.Content: I bought from the OEM for Cheap Store in Amazon a Blackberry 8310 GSM-unlocked cell phone. Before buying it the store confirmed me in written (email) that the phone was new (not refurbished) and unlocked and would come with all the items showed in the picture. The headsets never arrived with the unit although it arrived on time as promised to my residence in the US. This phone was to be used by my wife overseas.When she went to the local phone company we discovered that the phone was not new but used and probably refurbished and that the phone was assigned to a person in a service provider named Centennial (US) with an user name they provided and an unknown password and therefore no email service was possible with this phone.After several email correspondences, at last I got an answer apologizing indicating that their technical personnel would fix the problem in a couple of days and they could do it from the US without returning the phone. After that, it was not possible to make further contacts with them by email, always an automatic response and once a response indicating to call to a telephone that was never answered (two trials in different days). The problem was never solved.No doubt that this was a scam done through Amazon. I never had a previous problem with Amazon and always got what was promised but now I am suspicious of the type of merchants they are currently dealing with.Otherwise, until now this "new" product is operating OK as a cell phone but you don't need a Blackberry for this. I recommend people to keep far away from this OEM for Cheat Store.

Reviews.Title: I LOST MY MONEY....
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for use in Venezuela and only after 15 days of use it stopped to work. I sent it to a repair center and they inform the software was borned and it can not be repaired.I  lost my money...

Reviews.Title: Experience with the item
Reviews.Author: Patricia Meza "Patricia Meza"
Reviews.Content: I bought this item and I brought it to Venezuela. The Blackberry as a whole is unlocked but the blackberry's pin is still attached to T-mobile, so it's locked and I can't use it until I unlock the pin. My operator's company told I need to comunicate with T-mobile so they can unlock it, but I don't know how to do it! If you know any way to help me i would appriciate it!

Reviews.Title: Think twice before buying blackberrys from this store
Reviews.Author: Maria Jose Reina
Reviews.Content: i wanted a blackberry new and unlocked, as they offered. it came used and locked. i returned it and the second one the sent didn't even turn on. so i returned back. and asked for my money back. so i could buy a phone from a serious store.

Reviews.Title: Great phone, texting feature could be better organized
Reviews.Author: J. Fitzpatrick
Reviews.Content: Sound quality was great. texting feature could be better organized.  Lack good text conversation threading makes it difficult to stay organized in communicating with clients

Reviews.Title: Not Happy!
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this purchase. Had problems from the moment I got it. I had a sound when I was talking that sounded like I was being electrocuted and the track ball only worked when it wanted to.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Mobile.....Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Nell
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because I had lost my previous phone and wanted to replace it urgently. Unfortunately I only ended up wasting my money!! The phone is poor quality! The keyboard is extremely HARD!! you cant send a text easily because typing it would take centuries since the buttons are so hard! Also when I saved phone numbers on the address book and dialed them, they had an 86 country code automatically assigned to them which shows that the phone is a phony chinese make! The charger is of very cheap quality, mine broke down within a month without any reason while it was stuck to the power supply! Please donot waste your money on this and get some thing better for some more money!!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Bruce
Reviews.Content: This is an all round good Blackberry. It is going off the market, but if you can find it the price is right. It has all the normal funcions including the Blackberry messenger.It does have the ball for moving around which does need replacing after a year or two. The cellular itself will hold up for two o three years and then you will need to replace it with an upgraded one as in that time I am sure it won't be available anymore. I have found the 8900 to be very good, but of course more expensive. I also have a Torch which has more features than I will ever use.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry 8310 All u want in 1 phone
Reviews.Author: Trona
Reviews.Content: Its a very nice phone specially for its bb messaging system. With nice camera and music player and nice price. =)

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: Yomaira
Reviews.Content: muy bueno El Producto , LLEGO en Perfectas Condiciones Generales a Venezuela. ESTA TIENDA la recomiendo .

Reviews.Title: Excelente Producto!
Reviews.Author: Edgar!
Reviews.Content: Excelente.. llego en perfecta condiciones, todo lo prometido en la publicacion vino en la caja. funciono totalmente. PIN funcionando, el desbloqueo perfecto, funciona con toddas las empresas telefonicas. en verdad un gran producto!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE - VERY EAST TO USE
Reviews.Author: Phone Reviewer "Cell Phone Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: WOW! THIS PHONE HAS ALL THE FEATURES THAT YOU NEED AND IT'S UNLOCKED. I BOUGHT IT TO USE IN VENEZUELA. IT WORKS PERFECTLY WITH ALL THE FEATURESCAMERAEMAILBROWSERVOICE DIALINGBLACKBERRY MESSANGERMEMORY CARDS SLOTVIDEO PLAYERVERY EASY TO USE. GREAT QUALITY. I AM VERY HAPPY
